txt.en: Seal the breach in the Cisterns
Breach in the Darkness: The Back Door
That should keep more Orcs from sneaking into the city

'The Orcs must have come through a breach in the northern cisterns. Some of the tunnels in the northern section have been closed off since I was a child as they fell into disrepair many, many years ago. You must find their entrance into the city and block it off. It may only temporarily halt their movements but having time on our side is most crucial.'
Rubble can be found throughout the Cisterns.\n\nYou should collect rubble for sealing off the mountain entrance to the Cisterns that the Orcs must have used.
The mountain entrance to the Cisterns can be found at the northern end of the Cisterns.\n\nYou should seal off the mountain entrance to the Cisterns that the Orcs used to enter the city.
Orcs have invaded the Cisterns and it is up to you seal their entrance into Minas Tirith.
